name: Mechanical Repair Kits
tooltip:
Mechanical Repair Kits

The biggest reason I can't open up my booth is that... everything's broken!  I need mechanical repair kits to fix all this stuff!

Can you bring me those kits, <name>?  I'll trade you... kits for Darkmoon Faire tickets.  What do you say?

Requirements:
- Mechanical Repair Kit x 6
